text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Livain anabam, Ikiavɨra Itir God nguazir asɨzitam me ganɨngizir puvatɨ. A nguaziba Israelian anabar igharazibagh anɨngi, ezɨ Livaiba puvatɨ. Livain anabam, men bizir aghuir Ikiavɨra Itir God me ganɨngizim, a kamakɨn, me ofa gamir ingangaribar amuam, mati Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian God, faragha akam me bagh anekɨrizɨ mokɨn.
